isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Power Source (Sleeper)

svcproc.title: Power Source (Sleeper)
svcproc.para: If an accessory is plugged into the right bulkhead auxiliary power source sockets power will flow from battery stud (B2) through circuits 14AK, 14AW, fuse F10-C and circuit 14AY to right auxiliary power source socket. The ground path is circuits 11-GAG, 11-GBC, and 11-GBD and 11-GBC to ground adapter (454). If an accessory is plugged into the control panel auxiliary power source socket power will flow from battery stud (B2) through circuits 14AK, 14AW, fuse F10-C and circuit 14AZ to the control panel auxiliary power source socket. The ground path is circuits 11-GAN, 11-GBE, 11-GN, 11-GAF, 11-GBC, and 11-GBD and 11-GBC to ground adapter (454).
